Package com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Allocation
    An Allocation, defined to consist of a set of fragments of underlying byte arrays.
    Allocator
    A source of Allocations.
    BandwidthMeter
    Provides estimates of the currently available bandwidth.
    DataSink
    A component that consumes media data.
    DataSource
    A component that provides media data.
    DefaultBandwidthMeter.EventListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be notified of DefaultBandwidthMeter events.
    Loader.Listener
    Interface definition for a callback to be notified of Loader events.
    Loader.Loadable
    Interface definition of an object that can be loaded using a Loader.
    NonBlockingInputStream
    Represents a source of bytes that can be consumed by downstream components.
    TransferListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be notified of data transfer events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferPool
    An Allocator that maintains a pool of fixed length byte arrays (buffers).
    ByteArrayDataSink
    A DataSink for writing to a byte array.
    ByteArrayDataSource
    A DataSource for reading from a byte array.
    ByteArrayNonBlockingInputStream
    An implementation of NonBlockingInputStream for reading data from a byte array.
    DataSourceInputStream
    Allows data corresponding to a given DataSpec to be read from a DataSource and consumed as an InputStream.
    DataSourceStream
    Loads data from a DataSource into an in-memory Allocation.
    DataSpec
    Defines a region of media data.
    DefaultBandwidthMeter
    Counts transferred bytes while transfers are open and creates a bandwidth sample and updated bandwidth estimate each time a transfer ends.
    FileDataSource
    A local file DataSource.
    HttpDataSource
    An http DataSource.
    Loader
    Manages the background loading of Loader.Loadables.
    NetworkLock
    A network task prioritization mechanism.
    PriorityDataSource
    Allows PriorityDataSource.open(DataSpec) and PriorityDataSource.read(byte[], int, int) calls only if the specified priority is the highest priority of any task.
    TeeDataSource
    Tees data into a DataSink as the data is read.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DataSourceStream.DataSourceStreamLoadException
    Thrown when an error is encountered trying to load data into a DataSourceStream.
    FileDataSource.FileDataSourceException
    Thrown when IOException is encountered during local file read operation.
    HttpDataSource.HttpDataSourceException
    Thrown when an error is encountered when trying to read from HTTP data source.
    HttpDataSource.InvalidContentTypeException
    Thrown when the content type is invalid.
    HttpDataSource.InvalidResponseCodeException
    Thrown when an attempt to open a connection results in a response code not in the 2xx range.
    Loader.UnexpectedLoaderException
    Thrown when an unexpected exception is encountered during loading.
    NetworkLock.PriorityTooLowException
    Thrown when a task is attempts to proceed when it does not have the highest priority.
    UnexpectedLengthException
    Thrown when the length of some data does not match an expected length.
